title: Enhancing Learning Design Practical Skills: Designing Asynchronous Online Math Discussions Using Case-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze case-based mathematical problems from real workplace environments and propose solutions.
Learners share mathematical problem-solving strategies collaboratively with peer learners through asynchronous online discussions.
Based on case analysis results, learners systematically develop project-based practical solutions.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
